ComicInfo.Title: Inferno!
ComicInfo.Summary: Inferno!: Loki is ruler of Asgard. He imprisons Thor and the Warriors Three in a dank cell and then declares his wish to marry Sif. Thor and friends are freed by Balder. They rush to confront Loki and to free Sif. Then Surtur attacks Asgard. The heroes prepare to defend the realm eternal as Loki flees the scene.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:37:13. [Issue ID 23475]
